qas.question: What term is used for the act of using Church of Scientology techniques in contrast to what Hubbard envisioned?
What institution has prosecuted groups that practice outside the official Church without permission?
Who reformed Scientology making splinter groups heretical?
Who accuses the Curch of Scientology of squirrelling?
What organization has started several breakaway groups?

context: The act of using Church of Scientology techniques in a form different than originally described by <b2_0>Hubbard<b2_0/> is referred to within Scientology as "<a0_0>squirreling<a0_0/>" and is said by Scientologists to be high treason. <a1_0><b4_0>The Religious Technology Center<b4_0/><a1_0/> has prosecuted <b3_0>breakaway groups<b3_0/> that have practiced Scientology outside the official Church without authorization.
